thread.title: How Mattel's Hello Barbie could become a target for hackers - Canberra Times
thread.title_full: How Mattel's Hello Barbie could become a target for hackers - Canberra Times - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Canberra Times
title: How Mattel's Hello Barbie could become a target for hackers - Canberra Times
text:
Hello Barbie can converse with children by using ToyTalk's system to analyse a child's speech and produce relevant responses. At a New York City toy fair in February, Barbie and an equally blonde and long-locked adult handler chatted in front of a captivated audience.
Start the conversation, or Read more at Canberra Times.
